group_1.narration: I decided to participate in@the Shopping District's Halloween event,@but I was still at a loss on what costume to wear.

group_1.textCenter: Hmm...@I wonder what I should do...

group_1.narration: After I finished cheering on the soccer club,@I tried walking around Mitakihara@to see if I could come up with any good ideas,@but I couldn't think of anything in particular...

group_1.textRight: Huh...is that you, Natsuki?
So you're visiting Mitakihara, I see.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I was here for an intercity club activity!
Have you been doing well, Homura?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I have!@I'm glad you're doing well, too.

group_1.textLeft: Homura...@You're carrying a whole lot there...
Were you out shopping today?

group_1.textRight: Ah, umm, these are research materials...!

group_1.textLeft: Research materials...?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
I'm going to use these as references for@a Halloween costume.
I borrowed picture books from the library about@yokai and fictional creatures...!

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh...!
(I didn't think about doing research...)
You're so proactive and enthusiastic, Homura!

group_1.textRight: N-no...that's not true at all...
I've n-never worn a costume before...
I don't understand what would make a good@costume...
So, I thought to do some research before deciding.

group_1.textLeft: ...Heey, Homura!
Could we look up ideas together?

group_1.textRight: Uh... Umm...?

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, I'm dressing up for Halloween too,@but...
...I can't decide what to wear...
So, let's think of something together!
If you're not sure about it...
I'll tell you that I know my way around a sewing@machine...
What do you think...?

group_1.textRight: Yes...! By all means, I could use the help!
Hmm... There's Oni...Kappa...Nupehofu...

group_1.textLeft: Japanese yokai aren't really used as Halloween@costumes.
I guess common ones are like...@vampires, zombies, or wizards?

group_1.textRight: I-I see...

group_1.textLeft: It would be more fun if everyone immediately@recognized the costume.
I think that's the kind of costume we should wear.

group_1.textRight: Vampire or zombie costumes...@How would we make something like that?
Wouldn't a realistic costume like that@be a little too scary...

group_1.textLeft: That's true...
There's also witch costumes, but that concept's@pretty stale...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
...[wait:1.0][chara:200301:cheek_0][chara:200301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_0][chara:200301:lipSynch_1][chara:200301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah!

group_1.textLeft: Oh? Did you think of something?

group_1.textRight: How about a simple ghost instead?
If we do something like this...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, this is shockingly perfect!
If we add a bow here, it'll look like a girl's ghost!

group_1.textRight: Heh heh, it's so cute now...!

group_1.narration: After going back and forth with Homura,@we decided on a final design@and made the costumes together.
Dressed up for Halloween,@I took a commemorative photo with Kako.@Then I attached that picture@to a thank you message for Homura.

group_1.textRight: An email...@[chara:200301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200301:cheek_0][chara:200301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_400][chara:200301:lipSynch_1]Ah! It's from Natsuki!
...Eh! In this photo...

group_1.textLeft: This girl... her costume's a perfect match@with yours...

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah! Since we prepared and made them@together.
This girl is wearing your costume too...?

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh!
To enjoy Halloween, we prepared and made them@together.
That costume...looks great on your friend,@doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Your friend looks really cute in hers too...!

group_1.narration: Because of her,@this year's Halloween@was an amazing, cute, and lively time!@Thank you so much, Homura!
